website_summaries.verdict: This stylish shower speaker gives you full access to your phone's music playlist and enables you to take a call.
pros: Suction cup to mount it to wall
Volume is loud enough to hear clearly
cons: Some reports that it loses ability to hold a charge over time

customer_reviews.title: it was great. It was placed in a location where it ...
customer_reviews.text: While it worked, it was great. It was placed in a location where it never even touched water in the bathroom and it was no longer functional after about a month. (I've had 2 of the same soundbots and both have done the exact same thing.) There is supposed to be a red light that comes on to indicate when it is charging and it should stay red the entire time it is plugged in to charge. After approximately a month, the red light would only come on for less than a second when plugged in to the charger and then it would go back off again. So it wouldn't charge.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY. Died and doesn't work after two days of use. Won't charge again.
customer_reviews.text: This thing lasted two days of use (for about 15 minutes) before it completely died. I charged it for an entire day, went to turn it on and it couldn't even get through one song before dying again. I'm so irritated that I spent money on this because it died. I'm not sure if I got a dud, but this did not work. I even tried charging it for a few more hours both in the wall and via computer and nothing. It won't even turn on. Don't buy!
customer_reviews.author: Mesha

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC BLUETOOTH SHOWER SPEAKER!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had mine for years! It’s been used inside numerous showers (and fallen to the bottom a few times), outside concrete work, painting, weeding, and more. It still works beautifully! I listen to I❤️Radio, my own music, and youtube on mine. **When on I❤️Radio, I can skip songs with the up-volume button by pressing it quickly, once. **I have even answered my phone in the shower, or when renovating, by pressing the bottom button. (That way I don’t get paint/spackle/etc. on my cell phone.) Even with paint all over it, it still works beautifully!! They also make great gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Jami C

customer_reviews.title: Was amazing but went downhill quickly
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it, just wish it'd stay charged longer Edit: I brought this item down to 3 starts because after about a month it started to struggle holding a charge, then just stopped charging altogether. I was very upset that it wouldn't work without being plugged in because that defeats the entire point of said product.
customer_reviews.author: RagdollJessy

customer_reviews.title: Suction cup wouldn't hold, but it sounds pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: The suction cup wouldn't hold on the shower wall, but it does hold on the medicine cabinet mirror. The speaker needs a solid surface to bounce the sound off of, but it sounds nice. I can use it from across the bathroom while I'm in the shower. Using it only while in the shower, then powering it off until the next time, the battery has lasted forever on one charge! It did take a couple of tumbles off of the shower wall when it fell, so I can also attest to the durability of this speaker.
customer_reviews.author: TigerEyes2001

customer_reviews.title: Caution... Spend your money on a more dependable and durable product.
customer_reviews.text: Brought this speaker in July and originally it worked excellent. Then a month later, the sound quality diminished and now 3 months later the speaker will not even charge. The only reason I gave this speaker 3 stars is because when I originally purchased it, I felt it was an excellent product. Now three months later I feel it is a piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: "african-american-reader"

customer_reviews.title: Decent/nice speaker for shower.
customer_reviews.text: The speaker is nice and it connects to my iPhone directly and it only takes about a second for the speaker to connect once they are turned on. The only issue i faced was that the manual instructions say that you have to hold the power button for 3 seconds to turn off the speaker while infact you’ll need to hold the power button for 5 seconds to turn it off. If u hold the power button for only 3 seconds then u’ll enter pairing mode I believe . Other than that, the speaker is fine and it sounds fairly decent u kno, it’s not a Bose.
customer_reviews.author: Marz An

customer_reviews.title: Must have for the Shower!!
customer_reviews.text: This little SoundBot packs a pretty good punch. I usually laid my phone close to the shower but of course it wasn’t loud enough. I seen this and figured I’d give it a try. Setup was super easy. The sound quality is great and loud for such a mall package. This is no distortion at all. The buttons function and are easy to press. The suction cup is strong as well. If you like to listen to music in the shower this is a must.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Alley

customer_reviews.title: DID NOT WORK and cannot return!
customer_reviews.text: The speaker plugs in and lights up but plays no music and makes no sounds. I was out of the country and unable to return it by the date, contacted the seller and told them my problem and they said I missed the refund date. So. Anyone want a hunk of metal that does nothing? :( :(
customer_reviews.author: dawn stark

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: I just got this a few days ago. So far, the family loves it! It's safer than bringing your phone into the bathroom while you're taking a shower. I'm trying to keep it out of the shower as much as possible, just in case. But so far, it's still playing well after getting wet with a few showers. Good quality for the price. Waterproof speakers are ridiculously expensive. If you're just looking for a speaker to make showers a bit more fun, this is great. Sound isn't crystal clear for parties or anything. But for my purpose, it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Mehrnaz

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: It seemed to be charging fine (red light came on) but when I tried to use it a day later, it wouldn't work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Traci

customer_reviews.title: IT WON'T SHUT OFF!
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is okay, and the battery life is okay. What is NOT OK is that the speaker won't shut off! I had this problem with the first speaker which I received. I filed a warranty claim, and they sent me another speaker. THE SECOND SPEAKER HAD THE SAME PROBLEM AS THE FIRST. I see that they are now listing this exact same item under a multitude of names: BONBON Bluetooth shower speaker Aduro Aquasound WSP20 shower speaker WYNCO shower speaker Yingron shower speaker GANSS waterproof shower speaker A&B waterproof shower speaker HD waterproof shower speaker Pokanic waterproof shower speaker THESE ARE ALL THE SAME PIECE OF GARBAGE. DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brad Wohlander

customer_reviews.title: Not loud enough.
customer_reviews.text: My biggest issue is the volume. I got this so I could listen to music in my hot tub but when I turn on the jets I can barely hear anything and that's only if I am sitting directly below it. If you just want a speaker for by the pool it would work well, but if you have any competing noise near it it will probably get drowned out. Other than the volume everything else about it is nice. The suction cup works, hasn't fallen once. Bluetooth works great, super easy. I haven't tested to see if its water proof or not yet.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: 2 Units w/Mixed Reviews
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy to find a bluetooth speaker that would hold up in the humidity of a shower. It worked for a couple of weeks . . . then died. I exchanged it, thinking it was just a problem with that unit. The second one just turns off when it feels like it. If I turn it back on it will contunue working until it needs recharging. This is a bother, but I decided to keep it now that I know the pattern. If it stops altogether I will ask for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Parker

customer_reviews.title: Great for music and podcast
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and sound is great however it doesn’t suck to my wall very well, I did take a phone call on it and it was a little hard to here although the person I was on the phone with could here me fine, I don’t know if it has something to do with my phone settings though.... I also found it at 5 below for 5 dollars so that was a downer...
customer_reviews.author: Brittany N

customer_reviews.title: works great IN shower
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to actually have it IN the shower but I make sure the AC connector is covered completely. I have had no issues. it has even fallen off the wall (I didnt have the suction cup wet enough). But it still works with no issues. It says volume can be adjusted on the unit (Ive only been able to do it a couple of times). I mostly control volume from my phone. It also has the option of answering phone but I have that option off. I havent kept track of when it needs to be charged, but it gives a warning(several beeps more than once) before completely shutting off!
customer_reviews.author: RI-AliB

customer_reviews.title: Poor Suction Cup
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it's not a bad shower speaker. The bass is a little much and I really have to turn the volume of my cell phone up pretty high to clearly hear the podcasts that I like listening to in the shower. The "downfall" (literally) is that the suction cup doesn't stick very well. It will stay on the shower wall for a couple days, then fall off (sometimes in the middle of the night) which can be really frustrating and startling. At least it has a soft rubber shell so it takes a beating but it has fallen off the wall and glass door multiple times so that's why I'm giving it 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Bugs in a Box

customer_reviews.title: SoundBot is the best, don’t buy knockoffs
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these a few years ago and I lost them on vacation. After ordering knockoffs, we were disappointed they weren’t loud enough and quit working. We made sure to throw those away and ordered our sound bots. They keep working strong and stick anywhere really well. Charge lasts forever, and I use it every day in the shower. Charges easily and comes with a charger. Easy to use. Highly recommend. I tried using discount code for my next one I want to buy for my daughter but it didn’t work. Will contact customer service and see how that goes :)
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Blasius

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker for FOUR years!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this June 2016 and until now I've never had a problem - of any kind. Is the sound great? Compared to my Bose, no. Yet much better than other bluetooth speakers purchased after it. My shower is small, so it has gotten wet numerous times, if not every shower. It moves between bathrooms and vacations & travels with me. For the cost, which hasn't changed much, it works well. But now it won't hold a charge. After FOUR YEARS, I won't complain.
customer_reviews.author: NanC

customer_reviews.title: I thought this product would’ve been the perfect Bluetooth speaker for me
customer_reviews.text: If I could give 0 stars I would. I thought this product would’ve been the perfect Bluetooth speaker for me , but it’s not. This thing is not loud at all!!!!! On my device I made sure that the volume is to the max as well as the Bluetooth speaker, it’s still low!!!! I regret buying this!! Maybe they send me a used speaker this is ridiculous!!! Don’t you have something better? Something new and loud!!! Just wow. I am very disappointed. Ive only had this product for approximately 3 days. Is there a way that I can get a new one that’s louder?? Cmon guys.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It sounds OK but the build quality is bad.
customer_reviews.text: While it looks friendly and sounds OK, I've had 2 of these speakers go bad and I would advise you to look elsewhere. The first one just started emitting a shrill tone and wouldn't turn off properly. I returned it and received my current unit which worked for a month or so but then refused to charge.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Cheap feeling. Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I received this as a gift and was very excited. Though once I took it out of the packaging it felt very cheap and ended up not even working. I plugged it in to charge and when I did the ref light came one, however that’s all it did. I charged it for over 48 hours, watching it to see if the light would change to green and also checking to see if it worked intermittently and it never did. I returned this product.
customer_reviews.author: Andie7724

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever
customer_reviews.text: My sisters and I would always listen to music while showering, with no control of the music but reaching out. This device allows us to listen to music, hearing it loudly in the shower, and being able to switch songs. It connects easily, and is connected to 3 phones. It has a long range, as I can charge my phone in my room and still have the Bluetooth connected (so like probably 6 feet or more). Also being used for about 30 minutes per day, we only have to charge it once a month or less. Greatest under $20 purchase I have made, and was beloved by all.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Williams

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for about a week, and it is still showing that it has almost full battery. It isn't super loud, but you can definitely hear it. It's super easy to set up and use. I definitely recommend this to anyone who wants music in the shower without breaking the bank or your phone. I used to have a lifeproof, and I prefer this for ease and sound quality, as compared to having my phone in the shower as the speaker. I BOUGHT THIS. I DID NOT GET IT FREE. THIS IS LEGIT, Y'ALL

customer_reviews.title: Works great with all my devices except my Pixel 2
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife so she can play relaxing music or audio books with her bubble baths. I have had this Bluetooth speaker for over 1 year now and it's still working well, except with my Pixel 2. It has never been able to connect to my Pixel 2, but it has worked well with a Samsung Note 3, an iPhone, and and iPad. Pros: - Cheap - Suction cup still sticks even for over a year - Works well with Samsung and Apple products - Durable (still works after being dropped twice from about 6ft. up) Cons: - Doesn't work with Pixel 2
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Fortunately it is cheap
customer_reviews.text: Got this, charged it, used it once and the charge is gone. It would not stick to my shower (slightly rough tile) but I found a place for it. The volume is weak and not controllable from the speaker, only from the phone. I was pretty sure I turned it off but it was fully uncharged next time I tried to use it. Essentially disposable. I'd recommend putting in a few more bucks and getting a decent one.
customer_reviews.author: William Schubert

customer_reviews.title: Love this little guy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little thing! I'm glad I finally took the plunge. I take really long showers at least twice a week and usually I blast my phone across the room but its very hard to hear. This speaker makes it much easier to hear my audiobooks in the shower and I don't have to play it as loud and bother everyone else in the house. I've dropped it a few times now and it seems pretty durable. The suction cup works well. It's pretty small and cute too. Best $15bive spent on here in a while.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi RayTop Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: Small but loud
customer_reviews.text: I hooked this up to my laptop in my bedroom, which is down the hall from the bathroom. I jumped in the shower and my daughter hooked up to youtube. The music was so loud (based on the level of my computer) I had to have her turn it down a lot and move it away from my head!! It had no trouble sticking or staying to the shower tiles. My daughter jumped in afterwards (I left) and changed music. She loved it and now wants one. Sound and quality are great regardless of type of music. So far I have no complaints.... other than when the music is that loud it becomes distorted, but that's true of all speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon S

customer_reviews.title: Bad sound, doesn't stick to wall
customer_reviews.text: The sound is very muffled and tinny. It's louder than I initially thought but still quieter than expected. The suction cup doesn't work, don't trust it. I had it secured (or so I thought) and it just slides off after a minute or two. Ended up sitting it on a ledge, which doesn't help the sound issues.
customer_reviews.author: Torri

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the cost!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for 2 years in a row for my family's white elephant exchange at christmas and both years I didnt win it so my mom finally bought for me! Its everything g Ibhad hoped it would be! I love it! Great quality sound and easy to use. It hasnt fallen off my shower wall for the past 3 weeks so that also pleases me! Definitely worth the price and it's a huge hit at white elephant exchanges!
customer_reviews.author: Erin W.

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker that delivers way above what you should expect at this price!
customer_reviews.text: What a fantastic surprise this thing is. For the price, you shouldn't expect a product this good, but it's quite good. It's super easy to set up, the feedback tones are really smart and helpful, sound is as good as I'd expect from something that needs to enclose the speaker. I'm sure for $100 or more you can get something fancy and bulky that sounds better, but I don't think any of us are looking for audiophile quality in our showers, are we? Construction seems good, packaging is nice, as is the manual. If it weren't for the typos in the manual, this could pass as a $60 item on the shelf at some store.
customer_reviews.author: TexRob

customer_reviews.title: and the sound is slightly better than what I expected from something of this size
customer_reviews.text: For the size and price, this speaker works astonishingly well. My mom has an incredibly expensive stereo with a Bluetooth feature that leaves a bit to be desired. If I walk into the next room, it loses connection and the music cuts out. With this, however, I can walk anywhere inside of my house--as well as a fair distance outside--and it still stays connected. The battery life is decent, and the sound is slightly better than what I expected from something of this size. My only issue with it so far is that I have a lot of trouble with the suction cup. Overall, this was most definitely money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Amazing speaker!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this speaker! It suctions against the tile in our shower a little too good. It's hard to release it from the wall, but now we leave it there, and it's good for at least 24 hrs before it slides down to the floor. Once in a while, the volume crackles and it takes a few extra minutes for the bluetooth to sync. Having the controls on the speaker allows for the phone to stay out of the bathroom, and as long as your know your song list, you're good to go and able to go forwards/backwards to the song you want. We plan on buying another for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Rick L

customer_reviews.title: It works, but it's not that great at its function.
customer_reviews.text: Biggest problem is that it works, but the speaker doesn't produce much at full volume, and doesn't have the ability to counter teh sound of teh shower running, and thus you end up barely hearing what is coming through the speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Y.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! The sound quality is A1 (I set it on its loudest volume and then went into my kitchen and could still hear it clearly), the size is compact and very portable, and I love that I can change songs while in the shower. And yes it is waterproof. It didn't stick to my shower tile though, only to the glass. And it did come with a USB for charging, but it didn't come with an actual charger for it. I would prefer it did.
customer_reviews.author: Porsche Carrera

customer_reviews.title: get what you pay for~
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is good and I don't have any trouble pairing. However the suction cup falls off after a few seconds invariably, and the volume and skip forward/ reverse buttons are all shared. This leads to you having to press and hold to increase volume (unless it decides to just skip the song instead), which happens very slowly. Other than that, a great way to listen to a podcast in the shower/bath. Good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nonexistent Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: I had such high hopes for this speaker! It worked great for the first two weeks, then it stopped holding a charge. It would need to be charged after every single shower, and my showers are only 15 minutes. I read the mini guidebook that came with the product, but it's only suggestion for a longer battery life was to keep the volume on the speaker all the way up...which I was already doing. Now I charge it and go to use it the next day and the battery is dead already. It's too late for me to return or exchange the product at this point. I'm so disappointed that I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Way too quiet.
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace an old one that no longer charges I bought at Target. It is way too quiet for a shower, I don't even use it. It was a waste of money for me. Maybe some other people got lucky but I should have spent more money on something guaranteed to work better. It looks so much like the other random one I had too which had great sound but this one is just unusable in the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Andrei T.

customer_reviews.title: Great for getting lit
customer_reviews.text: Ok let me tell you about this life saver here. I only bought this for work because it was boring washing dishes in silence and my phone speakers were not that great. Its very easy to connect and figure out. Its not too loud that it distant other people which I like. But damn sis, this thing will get people lit if you play the right music. The base is popping. Brought this yesterday and its great and cheap. The only problems I have with it is that it doesn't really last 6 hours( only last 5 ish hours),has no walk charger, and it doesn't really stick to anything unless its glass.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good product
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this speaker for a couple of weeks and so far the sound and battery life are great. Since there are few buttons it has been hard for me to get the appropriate function to happen as one button can have multiple functions dependent of the length of the press of the button. My biggest frustration comes from the fact that the suction cup does not want to stay on my shower wall. Luckily I have a caddy underneath the speaker so that it has not had a major fall, but still the suction cup has even failed during my shower.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Hard On, Hard Off
customer_reviews.text: I can’t get the buttons to easily turn on or off! I have to press hard several times. I didn’t use it right away as my old Wusic was hard to give up. I would have returned this item, and I’m beck to using my old easy reliable Wusic shower speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Suz Mad.

customer_reviews.title: Great product - great value! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a little speaker for the shower and this one is it, especially for the price point. I have been using this for about 6 weeks and it has worked great. I have used it every day and have only charged it twice since buying - incl the initial charge. I was a little hesitant to purchase based on some of the other reviews, but I am very happy with this little speaker. Again, this is a small little shower speaker and does its job. It is not intended to be a Sonos sound system!
customer_reviews.author: Banana04

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not reliable functioning 100%
customer_reviews.text: Nice and cool design. Waterproof until now, couple of months. The suction cup is holding on since I ser it up the first time (have to follow the instructions: clean the surface as well as the suction cup with alcohol and put just a little bit of soapy water when aplying). The sound isn't very good but ok, and the controls don't function everytime, i mean, you try to skip a song and just works 50% of the sessions (not tries but sessions), but i guess maybe is just with youtube, the only app I've tried with it. Sometimes it also suddenly disconnects from the bluetooth connection.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Hoquee

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality and battery life, though suction cup could be better.
customer_reviews.text: This water resistant Bluetooth speaker does the job for its price. Pros: - Sound quality is surprisingly good for such a small speaker. - Battery life is good. I have had the speaker for over a month only have had to charge it a couple of times. - The color (neon green) looks pretty cool. Cons: - The suction cup did not stick well to my shower wall. It would stay up for a day or so, then fall to the bottom of the tub. After this happened a few times I decided to just set it on one of the ledges in the shower rather than suction it to the wall. Overall worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Beau

customer_reviews.title: Low bass
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would be getting a better speaker. The speaker was so low on full volume . I was disappointed I expected something good from a best seller. This same speaker was also sold in 5 and below so I was ripped off. Returned immediately. I'm giving 2 stars because the box came with instructions USB and box was intact
customer_reviews.author: Charles M

customer_reviews.title: Nice sounding simple shower radio
customer_reviews.text: Love this little radio. Have it in the shower. Has great sound and easy to use. Battery lasts a long time before you have to charge. You can even answer your phone from the shower by pressing the answer button if your phone rings. Only downside is the function buttons are "etched"...so they are the same color as the radio and I dont wear glasses in the shower so i had to memorize where each function button was. It would be a lot nicer if they made the play, forward, power, etc buttons a different color so you can see them.
customer_reviews.author: CityWife

customer_reviews.title: Only worked a few times
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in this Bluetooth speaker. I was only able to use it a few times. It didn’t hold a charge at all. Could only get through about 4/5 songs before the battery needed charging .It only lasted a couple weeks before it completely died, now it won’t charge or turn on at all. I would not recommend this speaker.
customer_reviews.author: MrsRobertson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little speaker
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent little speaker. It has great sound, decent battery life, and no issues with connectivity. I have been very pleased with the value of this speaker. I like it so much I went ahead and bought a second one to have as a backup. I highly recommend this speaker!
customer_reviews.author: Doxie Girl

customer_reviews.title: Going to try it once again
customer_reviews.text: Quit working after 5 months. Nothing happened to it and it appears to charge normally but will not turn on. Contacted the company and got a canned message back which I replied to but no further response from the company a week later. ***Update**** The same day I wrote the review a replacement unit showed up in the mail.Thank you Soundbot. The new unit has a more standard micro usb connector instead of the mini- round connector it had before. So they must have sent the unit after my first contact but did not relay the message to me that a replacement was on its way.I'm a happy camper
customer_reviews.author: Tech Savvy

customer_reviews.title: It does it’s job. Plays music 😂
customer_reviews.text: Okay so I like it because I wanted a speaker for my shower and it does it’s job. I’ve used it once so far, since I got it yesterday. I read other reviews about the battery life and I have to say that the only reason why the battery life is so “short” is because I’m pretty sure they don’t turn it off afterwards. You have to turn it off yourself to save the battery. The speaker part is located on the back. The suction is pretty good. Sound quality is okay. Volume is okay as well. It’s loud enough for me. The call was actually okay/good. He could hear me but not too well. It works 🤷🏽‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie  Romero

customer_reviews.title: You cannot charge and listen at the same time
customer_reviews.text: Previous SoundBot waterproof speakers I've owned have let you charge it while you play, which is helpful since the batteries seem to fail after about 6-12 months. Unfortunately this model shuts off when charging. On the plus side, they're now using a standard microUSB connector for charging, rather than having a different weird charging port for each model like they previously did.
customer_reviews.author: Termina

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: So I got this product about two years ago and it’s just as useful and well-working as it was when it was fresh out the box. I use it everyday and have had absolutely no problem with it. I’ve taken it to the beach, it’s been in the sun and the water so it has proven itself extremely durable. The sound quality is good but if you want a really loud speaker than I’d look somewhere else. I was very suprised at how long the battery life lasts, it took about eighty ten minute showers for it to die which is very impressive to me. Overall this is a very dependable product and I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoner

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty good for the price. Haven't been able how to turn it off. The volume and skip buttons are the same button, so that's a bit tricky. I don't need the sound quality to be awesome, since it's just for the bathroom, but the it has decent volume. Battery life has been surprisingly good, only have had to charge it about once a week, using it for a half hour or so each day.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Best $10 I spent!
customer_reviews.text: I had doubts about this because for this price, especially being an electric water product, I figured it would work for a month at best. Well I had this for over 6 months so far and use it every day in the shower. It works perfectly and I only had to recharge it once this whole time! I am also very impressed at the suction. I've never had a suction cup work this good. It actually works!
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: Not loud enough.
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I both love listening to our music in the shower. We put our phones in cups as a makeshift amp and have been doing so for years. I thought it was time we finally bought ourselves a speaker and so I did. And this thing is garbage. I gave it two stars because it does stick in the shower and make sound as advertised but just barely. The sound is at a whisper even turned all the way up. You’re better off buying a $5 speaker and leaving it on your sink. Heck, I can hear my music better when using the cup :/
customer_reviews.author: Makayla Samaras

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 2 years
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for 2 years now and am finally writing a review. It no longer charges, but if plugged in, it will still work. Yes, I know you can't use it int the shower if it is plugged in. Duh. Sound quality is good and can get really loud. It's good enough for the shower and connects to my iphone. Will be repurchasing another one. My advice to make it have more of a surround sound effect is to place the speaker laying down on the tub in the corner (suction cup on tub and power plug section facing corner)
customer_reviews.author: panda_lover

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. With such high reviews I expected more. It barely m works and when it does it doesn’t last long! Very frustrating. I got so made after repeated days of trying I threw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Mysunshine510

customer_reviews.title: She loved it, and was easy to pair
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so here is the low down. This was a gift for my daughter. She likes to listen to music on her phone during her 30 minute hot showers. So I got this for her, thinking her phone should not be exposed to all that moisture. Arrived quickly and undamaged. She loved it, and was easy to pair. Used for a few weeks, then it stopped taking a charge, so it no longer worked. Disappointing. So for $5, it ok. Even though we only paid $5, you would like it should last longer than a couple dozen uses.
customer_reviews.author: Dave's Tech

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little speaker
customer_reviews.text: You will not believe how good these speaker sounds. My daughter got this as a Christmas gift and uses it daily. She takes it in and out of the shower each day and doesn't use the suction cup. She just lays it on a shelf in our shower where it is out of the water so the only time it gets wet is when she takes it out of the shower with wet hands before she dries off. It charges easily with a USB cord that is included. She likes to listen to it loud and easily flips to different songs. It's no wonder she loves this speaker.
customer_reviews.author: JSEW

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy!!!! Only worked twice then stopped. Spend the money for a better product that will actually work.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my husband's birthday in October. It worked twice for a total of 10 minutes and stopped working. I've charged it several times and it won't turn on. I got this one because of the positive reviews. Save your money and buy a better product. It's going into the trash. Waste of money. At least I didn't lose a lot of money.
customer_reviews.author: Sleepy

customer_reviews.title: I would like to exchange this because the sound was awesome & it's user friendly
customer_reviews.text: This was awesome when it worked which was about a week after Christmas. It was easy to pair to my device but then all of a sudden it quit playing my music. It was fully charged and I tried pairing it to another device which I did however, it wouldn't play music from it either. Unfortunately, my window of opportunity to exchange it has expired which is a bummer since it was under my tree for so long not being used. I can see not allowing a refund (sort of) but I don't see any option for exchanging. How disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: 1 listen per charge after 3-4 months
customer_reviews.text: Bought this due to the 4 star average rating and it seemed like it would do what I needed it to, and it did, for a while. I've had it 3-4 months and now I can use it for maybe a 5 minute shower, then I have to charge it again. Unfortunately, the product only comes with a 1 month warranty. Not a big loss, since the product is cheap enough, but it's best to go with something higher quality and save money in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: KRepair

customer_reviews.title: Weak Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: Get if you don’t mind recharging every two/three days (using it 10 minutes a day). I bought this a second time because the first generation soundbot I purchased lasted a couple of years. Eventually it stopped charging. Figured I would purchase another for a couple more years, but no such luck. Unlike before, the battery life on this “newer" model, with micro USB, just doesn’t last more than three days. While the first generation Soundbot lasted a few weeks before needing a charge. Buy another speaker for the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Migz B

customer_reviews.title: Updated review-battery is better.
customer_reviews.text: This needs to be charged after every 15 minute use. I must have gotten a bad battery in mine. Update: this company was kind enough to get in touch with me and offer a free replacement. The replacement works just fine, and we've used it for many a shower without it requiring charging. My bad one must have been a fluke, sounds good, holds a charge just fine. Excellent customer service. Another update: Battery died after about a month.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't Purchase Again
customer_reviews.text: I have an older SoundBot speaker that I bought 2 years ago, and that one is great. The battery lasts a few showers before it needs recharging. I bought a new one for Christmas last year and I will say that the battery life sucks. Not sure if it's defective (honestly I didn't try to return it), but it dies way too quickly. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Arleyn

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have brought one couple years ago but I dropped it so I try to go to a cheaper version and it did not work out so I went back to the one that I know that word great product good morning I’m sorry I’m not understanding is it least one point OK let me look call today but I can
customer_reviews.author: Sheron mondido

customer_reviews.title: You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is the best thing I have gotten in a long time. The sound is pretty crisp and undistorted, and high volume as well--easily heard over the shower. It's small, cute, and suctioned to my tub surround like velcro. It was a breeze to set up, it's easy to use, it's resisted all the soap and water I've thrown at it, and I've had it for over a month and haven't charged it since I got it. Get one--you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: foxmuse47

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my children love to listen to music in the shower and my tablet was drowned out with the water running. This has great sound, loud enough to overpower the flow of water, and it reverberates off of the shower walls very well. If your device volume is all of the way up, the sound can become a bit distorted, but if it's around 80-85% and you turn up your speaker volume, sound is great. I listened to music for a few hours over the course of a week after my first full 4 hour charge. The only thing I've experienced is that sometimes it falls off of the wall, but no biggie.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Meyers

customer_reviews.title: Had to rebuy
customer_reviews.text: I had this speaker for three years, two of which were spent in a college apartment where six girls all used it everyday. It has never let me down. Somehow, it got left behind during a move and I missed it so much that I ordered another one. The speaker is plenty loud enough for a shower, the suction holds well and it charges quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Todd C. Caito

customer_reviews.title: Good for the size and price
customer_reviews.text: Sound is a little low for the size of the speaker but all and all it has been a good speaker for the 3 days I have used it. It sits in the shower, it gets moved to the kitchen and the living room and it is very durable but the suction cup is weak for the size of the speaker. So it sits on a ledge or counter top but the case is very durable as it has fallen several times even into water and is still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Died after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Worked for three months. Then couldn't be charged. Contacted Amazon, and was directed to contact the manufacturer. Not worth the time for the cost of this item, but I won't buy this brand again. Too bad - my daughter liked the look and sound of this speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: For the price it’s a decent speaker. Sound quality is decent. My biggest complaint is that the speaker itself is too heavy to stick on my bathroom wall (which honestly is the reason I bought it). I’m too lazy to return, and it honestly works fine. I will keep it for now
customer_reviews.author: Brittani Smith

customer_reviews.title: worked well until it died a few weeks in
customer_reviews.text: Product was simple and did what it claimed, until it died. I used it in the shower and on my stand up paddleboard. When the battery is low it continuously interrupts the audio with beeping, which is kind of annoying. It also calls the last person in your phone if you accidentally hit the phone button instead of the power button ( i called my boss from the shower a few times). The second time i recharged it, the light came on for a few hours while charging, making me think it was charging ok. But then it never turned on again.
customer_reviews.author: corey perlmutter

customer_reviews.title: Nice speaker
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice speaker for your shower. Has a good sound, good battery and the ability to play/pause, skip/reverse and control volume. My helpful hint, when recharging it is to take the speaker and suction cup off together, if you try to take the speaker off of the suction cup, you run the risk of breaking the suction cup. (This happened to the last one I had and then that rolled off the soap dish and broke.)
customer_reviews.author: ChicagoDave

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Connects easy to my iphone. Buttons work good. Feels sturdy. But the sound quality is terrible. Sounds like the speaker is blown. I just gave it to my kids and use my older BT speaker and set it outside the shower. At least it didn’t cost too much
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Best shower speaker ever
customer_reviews.text: This is a must buy speaker. It stays in the shower only out to charger. This is my second one. The first one I had about 5 years before the on/off button quit working. So I bought another and still 5 years later same great quality. Very clear loud sound, 100% waterproof and the battery last forever. If you’re look for a shower speaker this is the one.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Chick

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This thing never worked at all. I charged it for days and would not power up, but I had thrown away the packaging so I could not return. Also, doesn't even come with a micro USB cord to charge it. You have to supply your own. That's not a big deal but it would have been nice to come with it. Spend a few dollars more and get something better.
customer_reviews.author: Fitzy

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Did not work out of the box. Couldn't get a replacement so got a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Mills

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service is Spectacular
customer_reviews.text: So I posted this: Not loud enough to hear in the shower, so that sort of kills it. [2 stars] They emailed me in a day and politely pointed out that there is a volume button. I am so impressed by this that I think you should buy one just to reward a company that acts this way. It is, upon adjusting volume, plenty loud. If they had an IQ button on this thing, perhaps I would not be in this situation.
customer_reviews.author: John Cullom

customer_reviews.title: Love it - great quality, inexpensive & received promptly. Recommend to everyone!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my Sound Bot!!! The quality is awesome, the volume is absolutely great and I can't believe it, but I can answer my phone in the bathtub!!! How cool is that?!!! Would recommend this item to everyone!!! Great price and received very quickly. Thank you for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa H. Cato

customer_reviews.title: Great value proposition.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, you can't ask for a better product. Easy to set up. Good connection. Great sound! Put it near a corner in the shower and the sound will amplify, giving you a much fuller sound. Anyone complaining about sound quality or other, likely forgot how much they paid for this thing... Some people will never be happy and you need to ignore them.
customer_reviews.author: Flanpion

customer_reviews.title: Kids got them in their easter baskets and were super happy. Don’t hold a long charge but way ...
customer_reviews.text: Kids got them in their easter baskets and were super happy. Don’t hold a long charge but way longer than a shower which is what they wanted them for. They are 9 and 13. We always have music on in our home. They wanted it in the bathroom and so Alexa became a nomad traveling with my JBL. Now, they each have a traveler to join Alexa and I keep my speaker. Win-win-win “Alexa, grab him a towel!” Hmmm....It’s close to prefect,....so close.
customer_reviews.author: Rdeal2240

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it. Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is horrible on this. Very poorly made. If you want to get good shower speakers I love the Omaker speakers. They are amazing. Have had those for about a year now and much better than this crapola.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Bai

customer_reviews.title: Battery sucks
customer_reviews.text: This thing holds a charge for maybe 30 minutes. It's a piece of crap. I've had it for 6 weeks and would really like to return it, but the return window has closed. Very disappointed. The sound quality is not great either. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Shower Speaker
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a speaker for the shower for a while. I finally found this one that suctions to the wall and was not overly bulky. The sound quality is great and the battery life is amazing! I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Kidd

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cheap, but even then, not much value.
customer_reviews.text: I used this speaker for a few months, but the battery had trouble staying charged before long. The speaker quality was poor, and was probably on-par with my phone's speaker outside the shower (Nexus 6). The speaker charges though a special barrel-plug usb cable, so good luck finding a replacement if you lose it. The good news is that it's a perfectly functional BlueTooth device, no complaints there. The suction quality was good, never had an issue with that.
customer_reviews.author: Axel Kingsley

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: The first unit that was delivered would not hold a charge, so I returned it for a replacement. In retrospect, I should have recognized this as a BAD SIGN. The replacement unit worked fine initially. Over time, it needed recharging more often, and within 6 months, this unit will not hold a charge at all. And it has never gotten wet, so that is not the issue. Overall, I have concluded that this speaker is just a piece of garbage. Would not buy again. Save yourself the aggravation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shower speaker
customer_reviews.text: This speaker isn’t incredibly loud but it’s the perfect volume for a shower. The sound quality is good as well. I had to wet the bottom of the suction for it to stay on the wall but once I did, it stayed on tight. My sister accidentally knocked it off the wall when she was taking a bath and the suction stuck to the bottom of the tub under the water and wouldn’t come off, but when we finally drained it and got it out the speakers still worked as before. Great battery life as well!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Price!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this speaker since July 2016, got it for $11, just expecting to have it for maybe 6 months but it has exceeded all my expectations! The sound quality is really nice & the volume can get pretty loud as well. This past January, due to me not sticking it well enough, it fell into my shower and got wet. I definitely thought that was it. But I let it sit in a dry & warm place for a few days and when I tested it, it was working perfectly! If you're looking for a cute shower speaker, I highly recommend this one!
customer_reviews.author: Angel Rice

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this a zero, I would. I can't even use this thing. It won't hold a charge at all! Can get through one shower before it has to be charged again. And on top of that, the sound is godawful and tinny. Definitely would not recommend, EVER!
customer_reviews.author: Misslibbis

customer_reviews.title: This is not the first of these I've purchased - all have been pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: I use a couple of these in rotation in the shower, and the kids borrow one when they visit for a few days to do the same. Very functional, acceptable sound quality considering it has to play fairly loudly in the shower. A charge lasts about a month when used about 20 minutes a day.
customer_reviews.author: Elmer Fudd

customer_reviews.title: This is my second purchase of the Soundbot(s). The ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of the Soundbot(s). The first one has stood the test of time and water exposure, however either the cord or unit will no longer hold a charge; so I repurchased another. The new unit has a different type of cord and doesn't fit my old unit. Unfortunately the new unit sounds very low compared to the old one and will not turn off when attempting to hold and power off. Returning!
customer_reviews.author: L. London

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker
customer_reviews.text: I first one ended up breaking when it fell but that was after two years. So I did come back to the same company and purchase another one. I don’t know how I ever showered without one. Not the loudest speaker but it does what you needed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Brooks

customer_reviews.title: stopped working!
customer_reviews.text: less than a year in and every time i try it says, no connection. "make sure device is in range and turned on." it is. and it it is. but it won't. sad, i really liked this thing and used it every day, but is useless now. where is the great customer service i heard about? was not aware that i was buying a disposable speaker when i bought it. very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: mama trish

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I like to listen to podcasts while showering / taking a bath and this shower speaker works great! It did take me a while to figure out how to turn it off - You have to press and hold the power button until you hear the second beep. I do wish it would get a little louder but for what I paid, and the fact that it is a shower speaker its not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Diane W.

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker... while it lasted.
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed this speaker. The sounds quality was better than expected for a “cheap” speaker and was more than adequate for listening to in the shower. The problem is the battery life. It went downhill very quickly and now has to be charged completely full to be able to make it through a shower (10 minutes tops?) If not for essentially having to be on “life support” to be able to use, or to plan out in advance to charge it before I shower this would be pretty great. Perhaps the next version will get it right.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe

customer_reviews.title: good value - why did i wait so long to get one of these?
customer_reviews.text: i have had this for 5 months now, still going strong, I use it almost every day in the shower and i've only had to charge it twice. it is plenty loud for the shower and easy to connect to. only minor complaint is that the volume buttons are also the next/previous track buttons depending on how long you hold it down and i'm always hitting the wrong one. listening to podcasts / tunein in the shower is a game changer - i could never go back
customer_reviews.author: Joel T Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Just Upped My Shower Karaoke Game!
customer_reviews.text: This is SO much better than trying to hear my phone while showering. I haven't yet had to answer the phone using it, but I can almost drown out my singing with the highest volume. :) I love it!
customer_reviews.author: lalaisluv

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This speaker was a replacement for an identical speaker that I received as a gift a few years ago. This speaker works just as well. Although it doesn't have the absolute best sound quality, for the price, the sound quality is great. This speaker is also great to listen to phone calls, but I've never used it for a call in which I'm speaking. It typically holds a charge for 1-2 weeks (used appx. 20 minutes/day). When this one dies in (hopefully) a few years, I will purchase another one.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Yates

customer_reviews.title: Suction cup doesn’t stick!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a decent speaker and I love the fact that you can answer calls, but the suction cup is horrible! Won’t stick to anything in my shower which was the point of the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Geer

product_meta.title: SoundBot SB510 HD Water Proof Bluetooth 3.0 Speaker, Mini Water Resistant Wireless Shower Speaker, Handsfree Portable Speakerphone with Built-in Mic
product_meta.description:
Color:PNKSoundBot SB510 HD Water Resistant Bluetooth 3.0 Shower Speaker, Handsfree Portable Speakerphone with Built-in Mic, 6hr playtime, Control Buttons and Dedicated Suction Cup for Showers, Bathroom, Kitchen, Pool, Boat, Car, Beach, & Outdoor

Feature
High definition Bluetooth 3.0 audio wireless connectivity with seamless streaming and 6 hours of playtime.
Universal compatibility with Android and iPhone, iPad, tablets, smartphones, iPods, MP3, MP4 and other Bluetooth digital device.
Easy access to Handfree Talking/Volume up/Volume down/fast forward (skip)/Backward/Pause/Play/Power buttons.
Water resistant loud speaker and built-in mic for both outdoor and indoor use.

Specification
Bluetooth 3.0+EDR
Playback time: 6 hours
Charging time: 3 hours
Connection range: 10 meter
Transmitting frequency: 2.4GHz
Battery: 3.7V 400mAh lithium battery
Unit weight: 45g
Dimension : 2.25″(w/ suction cup) x 3.25″(diameter)

Package Content
User manual
SB510 Water Resistant Bluetooth Speaker
USB charging cable(AC wall charger not included)



Louder volume on the SoundBot SB510?


1. Increase the volume by press and holding the volume control button on SB510
2. Turn up the volume on the cell phone or other paired device to increase the volume
3. Battery is low: Recharge SB510
feature_bullets: ENHANCED HD MUSIC EXPERIENCE - Advanced digital sound, noise/wind reduction technology, and unique loudspeaker cavity structure to deliver premium acoustic sound and enriched music listening experiences w/ full spectrum coverage, crispy high note, crystal clear mid-range and balanced bass.

WATER RESISTANT & SECURE-FIT - Full featured ergonomic human engineering design with re-enforced detachable suction cup, water-resistant HD loudspeaker, and splash-proof surface to increase mobility and usability for everyday indoor or outdoor use such as shower, beach, pool, boat, bathroom, car, office, and much more!

UNIVERSAL COMPATIBILITY - High efficiency and eco-friendly advanced Bluetooth wireless technology that is forward/backward compatible to all Bluetooth-enabled media player devices such as Smartphones, iPhone, iPad, iPod, Mac, Macbook, Android, Tablet, Laptop, Desktop, PC, MP3 players and much more!

ACCESSIBLE - Intuitive built-in mic and dedicated control buttons for 6 hours of wireless music streaming and/or crystal clear hands-free talking call management from up to 33 feet of remote distance with free clear line of sight.

SUPPORT & WARRANTY - 100% risk-free 1 year manufacture warranty with responsive easy-to-reach customer service support team for purchases made from authorized resellers. A trusted SoundBot Branded Product Licensed Under US Patent No. D742,359

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars1,569 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
specifications.Best Sellers Rank: #218 in Portable Bluetooth Speakers#1,742 in MP3 & MP4 Player Accessories
